EmailTemplate.subject: Help your clients eliminate the costs of managing multiple solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Show your clients a better, more effective way to manage multiple health challenges Virtual care is now a common offering in benefits packages; however, these solutions may not be addressing every member’s needs. The traditional acute care model does not fit the 24/7/365 needs of people living with chronic conditions. Our three new chronic care management solutions eliminate the cost of managing multiple point solutions for you and your members. Easy‑to‑use online tools and services for diabetes, prediabetes and cardiovascular condition management create personalized, actionable and timely support. For members - Lifestyle behavior‑change tools - Medication optimization - Expert health coaching - Provider coordination - Cellular‑connected devices - Personalized plans for reaching health goals For clients - A simple, streamlined enterprise experience - Single implementation for multiple condition needs - Integrated billing, reporting and outcomes analysis About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
